notes: PHQ-4 is a well-structured 4-item screener with simple sum scoring.
No reverse-scored items. No high-risk items (no suicide question).
Subscales (anxiety Q1+Q2, depression Q3+Q4) correctly mapped.
All 4 severity bands have contiguous, non-overlapping ranges covering 0-12.
PRD reference: screening tool only, non-diagnostic language enforced.
